title: [Solution] Can't log in? AVAST may be blocking League!
body:
If you can't log in right now and are using Avast internet security, it may be blocking League as a malicious program;

1) Open Avast
2)Right click on any of the options you want to get rid of, (smart scan, browser clean up, home network security etc) and select virus chest
3) Click Virus chest
4) find the LoL launcher.exe
5) Right click on it and select "restore and add to exclusions"
6) Close it and your client should be working!

[*Thanks Xenomazul for explaining the solution*](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8sVhOttr-solution-to-log-on-client)

replies.body: Yup, Don't run Avast, so still no dice on the loading of your game. Getting really tired of not being able to play reliably over the last 3 weeks.

have you tried this:
________
Game Won't Start After I Hit the .exe / Play button

1. Try running as an admin by right clicking on the executable and selecting "Run As" and "Administrator", or by using the lol.admin.launcher.exe

2a. Delete everything inside the your RADS downloads folder (Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads) AND
2b. Delete everything inside your RADS solutions folder ( Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions)
2c. Restart your computer and repatch

3a. Delete the lol_air_client folder in your RADS projects folder (Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects) AND
3b. Delete the lol_air_client_config_na and the lol_launcher folders inside the RADS projects folder.
3c. Restart your computer and repatch

4a) Go to your Riot Games projects folder and open the folder with the number for the latest release (Default path is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0. 0.###) Find the folder with the highest number (currently 0.0.0.176 as of 8/6/12)
4b) Delete the following files:
releasemanifest
S_OK
4c) Then open the Deploy folder
4d) Delete the following folders/files:
lib (folder)
ETA-INF (folder)
mod (folder)
lolclient.exe (file)
lolclient.swf (file)
locale.properties (file)
4e) Restart your LoL application and allow it to repatch

5. Double check your anti-virus settings and exceptions for League

6. Make sure your Internet Explorer Settings are set properly See this guide (https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/21931765-Windows-Settings-Troubleshooting)

7. If you recently did a system restore, had a virus or did a Windows reinstall, you may want to try reinstalling League of Legends (http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234176-reinstalling-league-of-legends).

8. Run through the RADS Fix in This Video - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HHcfG9RV9Rw (http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/redirect.php?do=verify&redirect_url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DHHcfG9RV9Rw)
